instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2141: What is A2141? A2141 is a model number for a 16 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2019 with EMC 3347, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01700..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> - no update / fresh install / only catalina
threads.message:
hey guys,

got a <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 16" here. I can install catalina over internet recovery, but nothing else over usb.

"update failed" at the end of the progress bar in the recovery

dfu restore no help...

internet recovery is on sonoma now. (cmd+option+r)


any ideas?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> - no update / fresh install / only catalina
threads.message:
You shoud change security settings, before booting from USB.
Why need that, if you can install from Internet?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> - no update / fresh install / only catalina
threads.message:
i know that...

i want to update the system. but not possible.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> - no update / fresh install / only catalina
threads.message: catalina is going through. but no other system...
